name: Full Retro Panic
description:
My second game in the Godot engine. Still liking it, still have a lot to learn.

My idea for this game was to play all the final bosses from a game series all at one time. So you start in the first one and then each phase is a more modern version of the game. This was almost too much to pull off in the time frame of the jam. I had to cut a lot out.

Controls:
